snippet: Se Ri Pak’s victory in the 1998 United States Women’s Open sparked a transformation in women’s golf in South Korea and led to unparalleled success for Asian players on the L.P.G.A. Tour.
abstract: Se Ri Pak’s victory in the 1998 United States Women’s Open sparked a transformation in women’s golf in South Korea and led to unparalleled success for Asian players on the LPGA Tour.
lead_paragraph: Se Ri Pak’s victory in the 1998 United States Women’s Open sparked a transformation in women’s golf in South Korea and led to unparalleled success for Asian players on the L.P.G.A. Tour.

headline.seo: U.S. Women’s Open Win by Pak in 1998 Resonated in South Korea
headline.main: A 1998 Victory in the U.S. That Still Resonates in South Korea
headline.print_headline: A 1998 Victory in the U.S. That Still Resonates in South Korea
